verbs.description: Kim Dong Chul , Kim Hak Song and Tony Kim [V: were] greeted by President Donald Trump and his wife Melania as they stepped off the plane at Andrews Air Base in Maryland .
[ARG1: Kim Dong Chul , Kim Hak Song and Tony Kim] were [V: greeted] [ARG0: by President Donald Trump and his wife Melania] [ARGM-TMP: as they stepped off the plane at Andrews Air Base in Maryland] .

Kim Dong Chul , Kim Hak Song and Tony Kim were greeted by President Donald Trump and his wife Melania as [ARG1: they] [V: stepped] [ARGM-DIR: off] [ARG3: the plane] [ARGM-LOC: at Andrews Air Base in Maryland] .
